tuv.seg: The law specifies that contracts of employment must contain certain items and your employer must give you your terms of employment in written form
Sonraíonn an dlí go mbeidh ar chonarthaí fostaíochta míreanna áirithe a chuimsiú agus ní mór d' fhostóir do thearmaí fostaíochta a thabhairt duit i bhfoirm scríofa
Changes to your contract of employment
Athruithe ar do chonradh fostaíochta
Changes to your contract of employment may occur in a number of ways
Tarlaíonn athruithe ar do chonradh fostaíochta ar bhealach difriúil
Find out how these changes can occur and what your rights and entitlements are as set down by law
Faigh amach conas a tharlaíonn na hathruithe seo agus cad iad do chuid cearta agus teidlíochtaí mar a leagtha síos sa dlí
Fixed-term or specified-purpose contracts
Conarthaí ar théarmaí seasta nó sainchuspóra
Employees on fixed-term contracts generally have the same employment rights as employees on open-ended contracts
Tá na cearta atá ag fostaithe ar théarma seasta cosúil le cearta atá acu siúd ar chonarthaí neamhiata
Contracts without specific working hours (zero-hours contracts)
Conarthaí gan uaireanta oibre sainiúla (conarthaí uaireanta-nialasacha)
Employees on zero-hours contracts have certain rights under the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997
Tá cearta áirithe ag fostaithe a bhfuil conarthaí uaireanta-nialasacha acu faoin Acht um Eagrú Ama Oibre 1997
Protection given to an employee when the business he/she works for is transferred to a new owner
Cosaint a thugtar d'fhostaí nuair a aistrítear an gnó ina bhfuil sé/sí ag obair chuig uinéir nua
Being asked to reduce your pay or your hours of work
Nuair a iarrtar ort d'uaireanta oibre a laghdú
In certain circumstances your employer may ask for a reduction of your working hours or pay
I gcásanna áirithe d'fhéadfadh fostóir iarraidh ort laghdú pá a thógáil nó níos lú uaireanta a oibriú
This is a change to your contract of employment
Seo athrú ar do théarmaí agus coinníollacha fostaíochta
